operate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to use and control a machine or equipment
operate.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The Lewis family operated a number of boats on the canal.
Clive was experienced in operating the computers.
operate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if a machine operates in a particular way, it works in that way
operate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Check that the equipment is operating in a safe manner.

operate.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: a design company operating from offices in Seattle
